name: Tile Rush
description:
Tile Rush

Tile Rush is an isometric arcard-type game where you need to place tiles and create combos to maximize you gain while the terrain is perpetually shifting.

Game

You must place tiles quickly to make the best combo !

Create a strategy to collect more resources, but be careful ! The terrain moves at regular intervals ! You will always need to think about the next tile to place.

Tell me your highest score in comments (with a screenshot if possible) :)

Tools Used

List of the tools I used :

  • Unity : the game engine !
  • Blender : for 3D assets
  • GraphicsGale : for most of the pixel art
  • Gimp : for various art

Everything : 3D models, textures, sprites, musics, was made during the game jam minus a very few exceptions. Exceptions : 2 fonts (with correct licence).

Credits

All Music done by Noah Maxwell .
(Software used : Ableton 10)

Tile Rush is an arcade game developed by myself Revetoon in 60h during the VGJ2021 game jam.
